description: A secret World Government intelligence agency with authority to kill in the name of justice. Members are masters of Rokushiki and some possess Devil Fruit powers.

keyMoments.title: CP9's Strongest Member Defeated
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci, the strongest and most lethal member of CP9, is defeated by Monkey D. Luffy, marking a catastrophic failure for the organization.
keyMoments.significance: First major defeat of CP9's elite, damaging the World Government's reputation.

description: The World Government's military sea force, responsible for maintaining law and order throughout the world by fighting pirates and other criminals.

keyMoments.title: Marine Captains Engage Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Marine Captains including Shu and Very Good engage the Straw Hat Pirates and their allies during the Buster Call operation at Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Marines deploying Devil Fruit users to stop the Straw Hats' escape.

keyMoments.title: Forced to Announce Lucci's Defeat
keyMoments.description: Marines announce Rob Lucci's defeat over loudspeaker, a humiliating admission of failure.
keyMoments.significance: Public acknowledgment that the Straw Hats defeated the World Government's elite.

description: The dominant political power in the One Piece world, composed of over 170 allied nations. Controls the Marines and various Cipher Pol agencies.

keyMoments.title: Elite Agent Defeated at Judicial Island
keyMoments.description: The World Government suffers a humiliating defeat as their elite CP9 agent Rob Lucci is defeated at their own judicial stronghold of Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that the Straw Hat Pirates pose a serious threat to World Government authority.

description: A pirate crew led by Monkey D. Luffy, known for their straw hat jolly roger. Despite their small size, they have proven capable of challenging the World Government itself.

keyMoments.title: Captain Defeats CP9's Strongest
keyMoments.description: Luffy defeats Rob Lucci, proving the Straw Hats can stand against the World Government's elite forces.
keyMoments.significance: Major milestone establishing the crew as a serious threat to the World Government.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Reaffirms Promise to Robin
keyMoments.description: After defeating Lucci, Luffy calls out to Robin that they will return together, solidifying their crew bond.
keyMoments.significance: Emotional payoff of the entire Enies Lobby arc showing the crew's unbreakable bonds.
